title: OpenAI 'Orion' Model Release Date Rumored for Q3
summary: Insider leaks suggest OpenAI is targeting a late Q3 release for its next frontier model, codenamed Orion. Sources claim it will feature reasoning capabilities 10x faster than GPT-4o.

title: Anthropic Announces Claude 3.7 Opus with 'Agentic Mode'
summary: Anthropic has officially unveiled Claude 3.7, introducing a new 'Agentic Mode' that allows the model to autonomously browse the web and execute multi-step workflows without user intervention.

title: Google DeepMind's Project Astra to Integrate into Android 17
summary: Code snippets found in the latest Android beta point to deep integration of Project Astra, allowing users to control apps via voice and vision naturally.

title: Meta Llama 4 100B Benchmark Results Surface
summary: Early benchmarks for a mid-sized Llama 4 model show it outperforming Llama 3 405B in coding tasks, suggesting a massive leap in architectural efficiency.

title: NVIDIA Acquires AI Robotics Startup 'Figure' for $2.6B
summary: In a move to dominate physical AI, NVIDIA has acquired Figure. Jensen Huang stated, 'The next wave of AI is physical.'

title: Apple Intelligence 2.0 to Run Local LLMs on iPhone 18
summary: Supply chain reports indicate the A20 chip is designed specifically for running 7B parameter models locally on-device with zero latency.

title: Midjourney V7 Introduces 3D Model Generation
summary: Midjourney is moving beyond 2D images. The latest alpha allows generating textured 3D meshes compatible with Unreal Engine 5.

title: OpenSource 'Mixtral-Next' Beats GPT-4 in Arena
summary: A new mysterious model released on HuggingFace has climbed to the #1 spot on the LMSYS leaderboard, beating all proprietary models.

title: Microsoft Copilot to Replace Windows Start Menu
summary: A controversial design document leaked from Redmond suggests Windows 12 might replace the traditional Start Menu entirely with a Copilot chat interface.

title: Tesla Optimus Gen 3 Shipping to Factories
summary: Elon Musk confirmed that Optimus Gen 3 robots are now performing autonomous assembly tasks at Giga Texas.

title: Stability AI Files for IPO
summary: After a turbulent year, Stability AI has filed paperwork for an initial public offering, valuing the company at $4 billion.

title: Cursor IDE Raises $100M Series B
summary: The AI-first code editor Cursor has secured major funding to build 'the first fully autonomous software engineer'.
